# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

d, t, s = map(int, input().split())
print('Yes' if d <= t * s else 'No')
import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline


def main():
    (D, T, S) = map(int, input().split())

    if D / S <= T:
        print('Yes')
    else:
        print('No')

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


(D, T, S) = map(int, input().split(' '))

if D / S <= T:
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')

(D, T, S) = map(int, input().split())

if D / S <= T:
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

n, k = map(int, input().split())
print(min(n % k, abs(n % k - k)))

(D, T, S) = map(int, input().split())

if D / S <= T:  # 割り算はfloatになるので注意
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')

d, t, s = map(int, input().split())

if d/s <= t:
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')


d, t, s = map(float, input().split())

if d/s <= t:
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')


n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

print(sum(a))
